channel.title: Quick 508 Question
channel.description: How do I make it so that it's possible to cross the Wilderness ditch, and what files do I have to edit?

item.title: Quick 508 Question
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

go into your objectoption1 file (you need to know the object case for the wilderness ditch which I do not know sorry) and put a case for the wilderness ditch like

case WILDERNESSDITCHID: //Wilderness Ditch
Here you would make it teleport you inside the wilderness
I’m not going to tell you what the code is because I want you to figure it out
but I’ll give you a hint… Once you figure out how to make it teleport you into the wilderness
you’ll need to find a way to make it teleport you out of the wilderness too using this…
if (absX = XFOROUTSIDEWILDY && absY = YFOROUTSIDEWILDY) {
TELEPORTATION METHOD TO GO INTO THE WILDERNESS
GFX FOR JUMPING EMOTE
}else if (absX = XFORINSIDEWILDY && absy = YFORINSIDEWILDY) {
TELEPORTATION METHOD TO GO OUTSIDE THE WILDERNESS
GFX FOR JUMPING EMOTE

So yeah I hope that helped out, if you need some more hints just pm me, but I want you to figure it out

And fuck you for those that say no to 508, and what the fuck are you talking about a 509?? You’re a dumbass…

Read full topic

item.title: Quick 508 Question
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Give up on 508… 509 is out (or is it 510…). Also, 508s are very unstable as of right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick 508 Question
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

508’s don’t have a real client.java, they use many handlers, to decrease lag and increase orginization.

I suggest creating a new handler, and declaring things like ifIsINArea things, and then perhaps do a sendquest thing, or what ever they use.
Once you’ve done that, perhaps make action buttons work towards the ID of the interface buttons.

And then add it to your main file which holds packets.

Read full topic
